summary: THE DRIVER SIDE SUN VISOR DOESN'T SNAP BACK INTO PLACE AFTER USE.  I USE IT TO HELP PROTECT MY EYES FROM THE SUN WHILE DRIVING, OR TO HOLD UP THE SUN SCREEN WHEN PARKED.  INSTEAD OF SNAPPING INTO PLACE AFTER USE, IT DANGLES DOWN ABOUT 2" IN FRONT OF MY FACE.  I'M OVER 6' TALL AND THE DANGLING VISOR CAN BLOCK BY VIEW.  HONDA HAD A SIMILAR ISSUE WITH THE CIVIC MODEL A FEW YEARS BEFORE AND THEY OBVIOUSLY HAVEN'T FIXED THE POOR DESIGN.
